question: A 70-year-old hypertensive and hyperlipidemic woman comes to the emergency department with chief complaints of acute onset of impaired speech and comprehension with a right-sided weakness for the last 1.5 hours. The patient was on 2 antihypertensive medications and a statin, but she was not receiving any antiplatelet drugs. She has a blood pressure of 136/94, heart rate of 84/min, and respiratory rate of 15/min. Initial examination shows global aphasia, right homonymous hemianopia, and hemisensory loss. An acute ischemic stroke caused by distal left internal carotid artery occlusion with salvageable penumbral tissue is diagnosed based on a non-contrast CT scan, brain MRI, and catheter cerebral angiogram. Intravenous tissue plasminogen activator is given as treatment within 3 hours of presentation. Which of the following cellular processes is typical of the section of reversible injury noted in this patient?
question_persian: یک زن ۷۰ ساله با سابقه پرفشاری خون و هیپرلیپیدمی به بخش اورژانس مراجعه می‌کند و از شروع حاد اشکال در گفتار و درک همراه با ضعف سمت راست بدن در طول ۱.۵ ساعت گذشته شکایت دارد. بیمار تحت درمان با دو داروی ضد فشار خون و یک استاتین بود اما هیچ داروی ضد پلاکتی دریافت نمی‌کرد. فشار خون او ۱۳۶/۹۴، ضربان قلب ۸۴ در دقیقه و نرخ تنفس ۱۵ در دقیقه است. معاینه اولیه نشان‌دهنده آفازیای جهانی، همیانوپی هومونیموس راست و از دست دادن حس نیمه بدن است. بر اساس سی تی اسکن بدون کنتراست، MRI مغز و آنژیوگرافی مغزی با کاتتر، سکته ایسکمیک حاد ناشی از انسداد شریان کاروتید داخلی چپ بافت پنومبرا قابل نجات تشخیص داده می‌شود. پلاسمینوژن فعال‌کننده بافتی داخل وریدی به عنوان درمان در عرض ۳ ساعت از شروع علائم تجویز می‌شود. کدام یک از فرآیندهای سلولی برای بخش آسیب‌پذیر قابل برگشت در این بیمار معمول است؟
new_question_stem: A 70-year-old hypertensive and hyperlipidemic woman comes to the emergency department with chief complaints of acute onset of impaired speech and comprehension with a right-sided weakness for the last 1.5 hours. The patient was on 2 antihypertensive medications and a statin, but she was not receiving any antiplatelet drugs. She has a blood pressure of 136/94, heart rate of 84/min, and respiratory rate of 15/min. Initial examination shows global aphasia, right homonymous hemianopia, and hemisensory loss. An acute ischemic stroke caused by distal left internal carotid artery occlusion with salvageable penumbral tissue is diagnosed based on a non-contrast CT scan, brain MRI, and catheter cerebral angiogram. Intravenous tissue plasminogen activator is given as treatment within 3 hours of presentation. Which of the following cellular processes is typical of the section of reversible injury noted in this patient?
additional_correct_answer_source:
"Acute cell swelling is the classic morphologic change in reversible injury"
Miller MA, Zachary JF. Mechanisms and Morphology of Cellular Injury, Adaptation, and Death. Pathologic Basis of Veterinary Disease. 2017:2–43.e19. doi: 10.1016/B978-0-323-35775-3.00001-1. Epub 2017 Feb 17. PMCID: PMC7171462.
(https://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/pmc/articles/PMC7171462/#s0170)

question: A 65-year-old woman presented to the emergency room due to progressive dyspnea. She is a known hypertensive but is poorly compliant with medications. The patient claims to have orthopnea, paroxysmal nocturnal dyspnea, and easy fatigability. On physical examination, the blood pressure is 80/50 mm Hg. There is prominent neck vein distention. An S3 gallop, bibasilar crackles, and grade 3 bipedal edema were also detected. A 2d echo was performed, which showed a decreased ejection fraction (32%). Which of the following drugs should not be given to this patient?
question_persian: زن ۶۵ ساله‌ای به دلیل تنگی نفس پیشرونده به اورژانس مراجعه کرد. او بیمار مبتلا به فشار خون شناخته شده است اما به خوبی داروهای خود را مصرف نمی‌کند. بیمار ادعا می‌کند که دچار ارتوپنه، تنگی نفس شبانه متناوب و خستگی زودرس است. در معاینه فیزیکی، فشار خون ۸۰/۵۰ میلی‌متر جیوه بود. برجستگی رگ‌های گردن مشاهده شد. صدای سوم قلب (S3)، کراکل‌های بی‌بازال و ادم درجه ۳ دوطرفه نیز تشخیص داده شد. اکوکاردیوگرافی دو بعدی انجام شد که کاهش کسر تخلیه‌ای را نشان داد (۳۲٪). کدام یک از داروهای زیر نباید به این بیمار داده شود؟
new_question_stem: A 65-year-old woman presented to the emergency room due to progressive dyspnea. She is a known hypertensive but is poorly compliant with medications. The patient claims to have orthopnea, paroxysmal nocturnal dyspnea, and easy fatigability. On physical examination, the blood pressure is 80/50 mm Hg. There is prominent neck vein distention. An S3 gallop, bibasilar crackles, and grade 3 bipedal edema were also detected. A 2d echo was performed, which showed a decreased ejection fraction (32%). Which of the following drugs should not be given to this patient?
additional_correct_answer_source:
Why Morphine sulfate(MS) administration is done in mild cases of MI and ACS:
"The use of opioids in acute pulmonary oedema is considered standard therapy by many physicians. The immediate relieving effect of morphine on the key symptomatic discomfort associated with acute heart failure, dyspnoea"
(https://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/pmc/articles/PMC7407569/#abstract-a.g.b.mtitle)

However in cases with low EF:
"Morphine administration in the setting of AHF is not currently encouraged by European guidelines (except for palliative and end-of-life care).[7] Older US guidelines advocated morphine use in acute pulmonary oedema, but it is not mentioned in recent US guidelines.[63,64] However, it is still frequently used, despite accumulating signals for harm."
(https://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/pmc/articles/PMC7407569/#sec-a.h.jtitle)
Source of both:
Caspi O, Aronson D. Morphine in the Setting of Acute Heart Failure: Do the Risks Outweigh the Benefits? Card Fail Rev. 2020 Jul 28;6:e20. doi: 10.15420/cfr.2019.22. PMID: 32774891; PMCID: PMC7407569.

question: A chronic opioid abuser undergoes emergency surgery. Following the operation, the man is started on a patient controlled analgesia (PCA) thought to be dosed adequately to control his pain in the face of his opioid tolerance. He reports intense pain 6 hours after the conclusion of the surgery. Which agent could have been given intraoperatively to reduce this patient's risk of developing postoperative hyperalgesia?
question_persian: یک سوء مصرف‌کننده مزمن اوپیوئید تحت یک عمل جراحی اضطراری قرار می‌گیرد. پس از عمل، مرد با استفاده از تسکین درد کنترل‌شده توسط بیمار (PCA) که به نظر می‌رسد به اندازه کافی دوز بندی شده است تا درد او را در مواجهه با تحمل اوپیوئید کنترل کند، شروع به استفاده می‌کند. او ۶ ساعت پس از اتمام جراحی از درد شدید شکایت می‌کند. کدام عامل می‌توانست در حین جراحی به او داده شود تا خطر توسعه هایپرآلژزیای پس از جراحی را کاهش دهد؟
new_question_stem: A chronic opioid abuser undergoes emergency surgery. Following the operation, the man is started on a patient controlled analgesia (PCA) thought to be dosed adequately to control his pain in the face of his opioid tolerance. He reports intense pain 6 hours after the conclusion of the surgery. Which agent could have been given intraoperatively to reduce this patient's risk of developing postoperative hyperalgesia?

question: A researcher conducts multiple experiments to establish an infection and disease model for Clostridium perfringens in chickens. To ensure that all instruments are free of the pathogenic organism, he uses a disinfectant that oxidizes and denatures proteins. Which of the following disinfectants did the researcher most likely use?
question_persian: یک محقق چندین آزمایش انجام می‌دهد تا یک مدل عفونت و بیماری برای Clostridium perfringens در مرغ‌ها ایجاد کند. برای اطمینان از اینکه تمام ابزارها از این ارگانیسم بیماری‌زا پاک هستند، او از یک ماده ضدعفونی‌کننده استفاده می‌کند که پروتئین‌ها را اکسید و دناتوره می‌کند. کدام‌یک از مواد ضدعفونی‌کننده زیر به احتمال زیاد توسط محقق استفاده شده‌است؟
new_question_stem: A researcher conducts multiple experiments to establish an infection and disease model for Clostridium perfringens in chickens. To ensure that all instruments are free of the pathogenic organism, he uses a disinfectant that oxidizes and denatures proteins. Which of the following disinfectants did the researcher most likely use?

question: A 9-month-old boy is brought to the physician by his mother because of intermittent watery diarrhea for several months. Pregnancy and delivery were uncomplicated. He was diagnosed with eczematous dermatitis at 3 months old. His height and weight are below the 5th percentile. Immunologic evaluation shows a defect in activated regulatory T cells. A genetic analysis shows a mutation in the FOXP3 gene. This patient is at increased risk for which of the following?
question_persian: پسر بچه‌ای ۹ ماهه توسط مادرش به دلیل اسهال آبکی متناوب که چندین ماه طول کشیده است، نزد پزشک آورده می‌شود. بارداری و زایمان بدون مشکل بوده‌اند. او در ۳ ماهگی به درماتیت اگزمایی تشخیص داده شد. قد و وزن او زیر صدک ۵ام قرار دارند. ارزیابی ایمنی‌شناختی نشان‌دهنده نقص در سلول‌های T تنظیمی فعال شده است. تجزیه و تحلیل ژنتیکی نشان‌دهنده جهش در ژن FOXP3 است. این بیمار در معرض خطر افزایش یافته برای کدام یک از موارد زیر است؟

options_persian.E: شوک آنافیلاکتیک ناشی از انتقال خون

new_question_stem: A 9-month-old boy is brought to the physician by his mother because of intermittent watery diarrhea for several months. Pregnancy and delivery were uncomplicated. He was diagnosed with eczematous dermatitis at 3 months old. His height and weight are below the 5th percentile. Immunologic evaluation shows a defect in activated regulatory T cells. A genetic analysis shows a mutation in the FOXP3 gene. This patient is at increased risk for which of the following?

question: A routine newborn screening test for phenylketonuria in a male neonate shows a serum phenylalanine concentration of 44 mg/dL (N < 20). He is started on a special diet and the hyperphenylalaninemia resolves. At a routine well-child examination 4 months later, the physician notices that he has persistent head lag. On examination, he has blue eyes, pale skin, blonde hair, and generalized hypotonia. His serum prolactin level is markedly elevated. Supplementation of which of the following substances is most likely to prevent further complications of this patient's condition?
question_persian: آزمایش غربالگری معمول نوزادان برای فنیل کتونوریا در یک نوزاد پسر غلظت فنیل‌آلانین سرم را ۴۴ میلی‌گرم در دسی‌لیتر (N < 20) نشان می‌دهد. او با یک رژیم غذایی ویژه شروع به درمان می‌کند و هایپرفنیل‌آلانینمی برطرف می‌شود. در یک معاینه معمول کودک سالم ۴ ماه بعد، پزشک متوجه می‌شود که او همچنان دچار افتادگی سر است. در معاینه، او چشمان آبی، پوست رنگ‌پریده، موهای بلوند و هیپوتونی عمومی دارد. سطح پرولاکتین سرم او به طور قابل توجهی افزایش یافته است. مکمل کدام یک از مواد زیر به احتمال زیاد از بروز عوارض بیشتر در شرایط این بیمار جلوگیری می‌کند؟
new_question_stem: A routine newborn screening test for phenylketonuria in a male neonate shows a serum phenylalanine concentration of 44 mg/dL (N < 20). He is started on a special diet and the hyperphenylalaninemia resolves. At a routine well-child examination 4 months later, the physician notices that he has persistent head lag. On examination, he has blue eyes, pale skin, blonde hair, and generalized hypotonia. His serum prolactin level is markedly elevated. Supplementation of which of the following substances is most likely to prevent further complications of this patient's condition?
new_contradictory_option_source:
The artificial sweeter aspartame, which is found in diet soda and many other low-calorie items, should be avoided as it contains high amounts of phenylalanine.
https://medlineplus.gov/genetics/condition/phenylketonuria/#causes:~:text=artificial%20sweeter%20aspartame%2C

question: A 62-year-old man with a history of chronic bronchitis comes to the physician because of a 1-month history of worsening shortness of breath and cough productive of thick sputum. He smoked one pack of cigarettes daily for 20 years but quit 5 years ago. Physical examination shows an increased anteroposterior chest diameter and coarse crackles in the lower lung fields bilaterally. Treatment with a drug that directly antagonizes the effects of vagal stimulation on the airways is begun. Which of the following drugs was most likely started?
question_persian: مردی ۶۲ ساله با سابقه برونشیت مزمن به دلیل یک ماه سابقه بدتر شدن تنگی نفس و سرفه با خلط ضخیم به پزشک مراجعه می‌کند. او به مدت ۲۰ سال روزانه یک بسته سیگار می‌کشیده اما ۵ سال پیش ترک کرده است. معاینه فیزیکی نشان می‌دهد که قطر قدامی-خلفی قفسه سینه افزایش یافته و خرخرهای درشت در میدان‌های تحتانی ریه‌ها دو طرفه شنیده می‌شود. درمان با دارویی که به طور مستقیم اثرات تحریک واگ بر راه‌های هوایی را متضاد می‌کند آغاز می‌شود. کدام یک از داروهای زیر به احتمال زیاد شروع شده است؟
new_question_stem: A 62-year-old man with a history of chronic bronchitis comes to the physician because of a 1-month history of worsening shortness of breath and cough productive of thick sputum. He smoked one pack of cigarettes daily for 20 years but quit 5 years ago. Physical examination shows an increased anteroposterior chest diameter and coarse crackles in the lower lung fields bilaterally. Treatment with a drug that directly antagonizes the effects of vagal stimulation on the airways is begun. Which of the following drugs was most likely started?

question: A pediatrician notices that 9 of her patients this year have developed paralysis after a flu-like illness. They range in age from 7 to 11, and most of them had no abnormal activities prior to developing the paralysis. These patients concern her because she has not seen this type of paralytic illness in over 20 years of practice. Based on this experience, she decides to write up the initial presentation and clinical course of these patients and publish them in a journal. Which of the following is most likely true about this study?
question_persian: یک متخصص کودکان متوجه می‌شود که ۹ نفر از بیمارانش در سال جاری پس از یک بیماری شبیه به آنفولانزا دچار فلج شده‌اند. سن این بیماران بین ۷ تا ۱۱ سال است و بیشتر آن‌ها قبل از فلج شدن فعالیت‌های غیرعادی نداشته‌اند. این بیماران او را نگران می‌کنند زیرا در بیش از ۲۰ سال فعالیت خود، چنین نوع بیماری فلجی را ندیده است. بر اساس این تجربه، او تصمیم می‌گیرد که ارائه اولیه و سیر بالینی این بیماران را بنویسد و آن‌ها را در یک مجله منتشر کند. کدام یک از موارد زیر به احتمال زیاد در مورد این مطالعه صحیح است؟

options.A: Different interventions with 2 or more variables can be studied
options.C: It should be reported in terms of odds ratio
options.D: It should be reported in terms of relative risk
options.E: Participants act as their own controls

options_persian.A: مداخلات مختلف با 2 یا تعداد بیشتری متغیر قابل مطالعه هستند.
options_persian.C: باید به صورت نسبت شانس گزارش شود.
options_persian.D: باید به صورت خطر نسبی گزارش شود
options_persian.E: شرکت‌کنندگان به عنوان کنترل‌های خودشان عمل می‌کنند

new_question_stem: A pediatrician notices that 9 of her patients this year have developed paralysis after a flu-like illness. They range in age from 7 to 11, and most of them had no abnormal activities prior to developing the paralysis. These patients concern her because she has not seen this type of paralytic illness in over 20 years of practice. Based on this experience, she decides to write up the initial presentation and clinical course of these patients and publish them in a journal. Which of the following is most likely true about this study?

question: While in the ICU, a 62-year-old male undergoes placement of a Swan-Ganz catheter to evaluate his right heart pressures. All pressures are found to be within normal limits, and the cardiology fellow records a pulmonary wedge pressure of 10 mmHg. Which of the following are normal values for the pressures that will be obtained from this patient's right ventricle?
question_persian: در حالی که در بخش مراقبت‌های ویژه (ICU) است، یک مرد 62 ساله تحت قرار دادن کاتتر سوان-گانز قرار می‌گیرد تا فشارهای قلب راست او ارزیابی شود. تمامی فشارها در محدوده طبیعی قرار دارند و دستیار تخصصی قلب و عروق فشار گوه‌ای ریوی (pulmonary wedge pressure) را 10 میلی‌متر جیوه ثبت کرده است. کدام یک از مقادیر زیر برای فشارهایی که از بطن راست این بیمار به دست می‌آید، طبیعی هستند؟
new_question_stem: While in the ICU, a 62-year-old male undergoes placement of a Swan-Ganz catheter to evaluate his right heart pressures. All pressures are found to be within normal limits, and the cardiology fellow records a pulmonary wedge pressure of 10 mmHg. Which of the following are normal values for the pressures that will be obtained from this patient's right ventricle?

question: A 25-year-old woman presents to her new family physician for a follow-up appointment. She previously presented with itching, as well as frequent and painful urination. A vaginal swab was taken and sent to the laboratory to confirm the diagnosis. Diplococci were seen on Gram stain and were grown on Thayer-Martin agar. When discussing her infection, the patient says that she uses safe sex practices. Her history is significant for meningitis and for infection with Streptococcus pneumoniae. The physician discusses that the reason behind these infections comes from a defect in the innate immune system. Which of the following best describes the component that is likely deficient in this patient?
question_persian: یک زن ۲۵ ساله برای یک قرار ملاقات پیگیری به پزشک خانواده جدید خود مراجعه می‌کند. او قبلاً با خارش، و همچنین ادرار مکرر و دردناک مراجعه کرده بود. یک نمونه واژینال گرفته شد و برای تأیید تشخیص به آزمایشگاه ارسال شد. دیپلوکوک‌ها در رنگ‌آمیزی گرم دیده شدند و در آگار تایر-مارتین رشد کردند. هنگام بحث در مورد عفونت او، بیمار می‌گوید که از روش‌های رابطه جنسی ایمن استفاده می‌کند. سابقه او شامل مننژیت و عفونت با استرپتوکوک پنومونیه است. پزشک توضیح می‌دهد که دلیل این عفونت‌ها ناشی از نقص در سیستم ایمنی ذاتی است. کدام یک از موارد زیر به بهترین نحو مؤلفه‌ای را توصیف می‌کند که احتمالاً در این بیمار کمبود دارد؟
answer: Creates pores in the cell membrane
answer_persian: سوراخ‌هایی در غشای سلولی ایجاد می‌کند

options.D: Creates pores in the cell membrane

options_persian.A: به‌عنوان یک اوپسونین مهم عمل می‌کند.
options_persian.C: تجزیه شده توسط مهارکننده استراز C1
options_persian.D: در غشاء سلول منفذ ایجاد می‌کند
options_persian.E: مسیر جایگزین کمپلمان را تحریک می‌کند.

new_question_stem: A 25-year-old woman presents to her new family physician for a follow-up appointment. She previously presented with itching, as well as frequent and painful urination. A vaginal swab was taken and sent to the laboratory to confirm the diagnosis. Diplococci were seen on Gram stain and were grown on Thayer-Martin agar. When discussing her infection, the patient says that she uses safe sex practices. Her history is significant for meningitis and for infection with Streptococcus pneumoniae. The physician discusses that the reason behind these infections comes from a defect in the innate immune system. Which of the following best describes the component that is likely deficient in this patient?

question: A 62-year-old woman comes to the physician because of a 6-month history of progressive pain and stiffness of the fingers of her right hand. The stiffness is worse at the end of the day. She recently retired after working for 28 years as a typist at a data entry firm. Physical examination shows swelling, joint-line tenderness, and decreased range of motion of the first metacarpophalangeal joint and the distal interphalangeal joints of the right hand. Discrete, hard, mildly tender nodules are palpated over the 2nd and 4th distal interphalangeal joints of the right hand. An x-ray of her right hand shows narrowing of the interphalangeal joint spaces with subchondral sclerosis and osteophytes. Which of the following is the most likely underlying mechanism of this patient's condition?
question_persian: یک زن ۶۲ ساله به دلیل سابقه ۶ ماهه درد و سفتی پیشرونده انگشتان دست راست خود به پزشک مراجعه می‌کند. سفتی در پایان روز بدتر می‌شود. او اخیراً پس از ۲۸ سال کار به عنوان تایپیست در یک شرکت ورود داده بازنشسته شده است. معاینه فیزیکی نشان می‌دهد که تورم، حساسیت در خط مفصل و کاهش دامنه حرکتی در مفصل متاکارپوفالانژیال اول و مفاصل بین‌فالانژیال دیستال دست راست وجود دارد. ندول‌های سخت و کمی حساس در مفاصل بین‌فالانژیال دیستال دوم و چهارم دست راست لمس می‌شوند. رادیوگرافی دست راست او نشان‌دهنده تنگی فضای مفصلی بین‌فالانژیال با اسکلروز ساب‌کوندرال و استئوفیت‌ها است. کدام یک از موارد زیر محتمل‌ترین مکانیسم زمینه‌ای وضعیت این بیمار است؟

options.A: Monosodium urate crystal precipitation in the joints
options.B: Bacterial infection of the joint space
options.D: Calcium pyrophosphate dihydrate crystal precipitation in the joints

options_persian.A: رسوب کریستال مونو سدیم اورات در مفاصل
options_persian.D: رسوب بلورهای کلسیم پیروفسفات دی‌هیدرات در مفاصل

new_question_stem: A 62-year-old woman comes to the physician because of a 6-month history of progressive pain and stiffness of the fingers of her right hand. The stiffness is worse at the end of the day. She recently retired after working for 28 years as a typist at a data entry firm. Physical examination shows swelling, joint-line tenderness, and decreased range of motion of the first metacarpophalangeal joint and the distal interphalangeal joints of the right hand. Discrete, hard, mildly tender nodules are palpated over the 2nd and 4th distal interphalangeal joints of the right hand. An x-ray of her right hand shows narrowing of the interphalangeal joint spaces with subchondral sclerosis and osteophytes. Which of the following is the most likely underlying mechanism of this patient's condition?

question: A 65-year-old woman comes to the physician for a routine bone mineral density screening. She does not have any children. Menopause was at age 55. Her mother died of breast cancer at the age of 48 years. She has hypertension for which she takes ramipril. Dual-energy x-ray absorptiometry at the femoral neck shows a T-score of -2.7 SD. The physician considers treatment with raloxifene. This medication would put her at increased risk of developing which of the following conditions?
question_persian: یک زن ۶۵ ساله برای غربالگری معمول تراکم مواد معدنی استخوان به پزشک مراجعه می‌کند. او هیچ فرزندی ندارد. یائسگی او در سن ۵۵ سالگی رخ داده است. مادرش در سن ۴۸ سالگی بر اثر سرطان پستان فوت کرد. او مبتلا به فشار خون است و برای آن رامپریل مصرف می‌کند. سنجش تراکم استخوان با استفاده از روش دگزا در گردن استخوان ران نشان‌دهنده T-score برابر با ۲.۷- SD است. پزشک درمان با رالوکسیفن را در نظر می‌گیرد. این دارو او را در معرض افزایش خطر ابتلا به کدام یک از شرایط زیر قرار می‌دهد؟
new_question_stem: A 65-year-old woman comes to the physician for a routine bone mineral density screening. She does not have any children. Menopause was at age 55. Her mother died of breast cancer at the age of 48 years. She has hypertension for which she takes ramipril. Dual-energy x-ray absorptiometry at the femoral neck shows a T-score of -2.7 SD. The physician considers treatment with raloxifene. This medication would put her at increased risk of developing which of the following conditions?

question: A 29-year-old man comes in for evaluation of infertility. He has been trying to conceive for over 2 years with his wife and previous evaluation of his wife's fertility revealed no abnormalities. Physical exam reveals a tall man with long extremities, sparse body hair, gynecomastia, and small testes. Laboratory studies reveal increased serum follicle-stimulating hormone concentration and an increased estradiol:testosterone ratio. Genetic studies reveal a cytogenetic abnormality. If this abnormality was inherited from the patient's father, at which stage of spermatogenesis did this error most likely occur?
question_persian: مردی ۲۹ ساله برای ارزیابی ناباروری مراجعه می‌کند. او بیش از ۲ سال است که با همسرش برای بارداری تلاش می‌کند و ارزیابی‌های قبلی از باروری همسرش هیچگونه ناهنجاری‌ای نشان نداده است. معاینه فیزیکی نشان می‌دهد که او مردی قدبلند با اندام‌های بلند، موی بدن پراکنده، ژنیکوماستی و بیضه‌های کوچک است. مطالعات آزمایشگاهی نشان می‌دهد که غلظت هورمون تحریک‌کننده فولیکول در سرم افزایش یافته و نسبت استرادیول به تستوسترون نیز افزایش یافته است. مطالعات ژنتیکی یک ناهنجاری سیتوژنتیکی را نشان می‌دهند. اگر این ناهنجاری از پدر بیمار به ارث رسیده باشد، در کدام مرحله اسپرماتوژنز احتمالاً این خطا رخ داده است؟
new_question_stem: A 29-year-old man comes in for evaluation of infertility. He has been trying to conceive for over 2 years with his wife and previous evaluation of his wife's fertility revealed no abnormalities. Physical exam reveals a tall man with long extremities, sparse body hair, gynecomastia, and small testes. Laboratory studies reveal increased serum follicle-stimulating hormone concentration and an increased estradiol:testosterone ratio. Genetic studies reveal a cytogenetic abnormality. If this abnormality was inherited from the patient's father, at which stage of spermatogenesis did this error most likely occur?

question: A 16-year-old patient presents to the physician’s office with an absence of menstruations. Her last period was 6 months ago. Since almost a year and a half ago, she intentionally restricted her diet at the expense of carbohydrates, exercised intensively, and lost 18.0 kg (39.7 lb). She had her menarche at the age of 12 and menstruated normally until last year. She is not sexually active. On physical examination, the vital signs include blood pressure 100/60 mm Hg, heart rate 55/min, respiratory rate 12/min, and temperature 35.9°C (96.6°F). Her weight is 55.0 kg (121.3 lb), and her height is 166 cm (5 ft 5 in). Physical examination reveals the good development of muscles and decreased adiposity. A bone scan shows decreased calcium mineral deposits. Which statement about this patient’s condition is correct?
question_persian: بیماری ۱۶ ساله به مطب پزشک مراجعه می‌کند با عدم وجود قاعدگی. آخرین پریود او ۶ ماه پیش بوده است. از حدود یک سال و نیم پیش، او به طور عمدی رژیم غذایی خود را با کاهش کربوهیدرات‌ها محدود کرده، به شدت ورزش کرده و ۱۸.۰ کیلوگرم (۳۹.۷ پوند) وزن کم کرده است. او در سن ۱۲ سالگی اولین قاعدگی خود را تجربه کرده و تا سال گذشته به طور نرمال قاعدگی داشته است. او فعالیت جنسی ندارد. در معاینه فیزیکی، علائم حیاتی شامل فشار خون ۱۰۰/۶۰ میلی‌متر جیوه، ضربان قلب ۵۵ در دقیقه، نرخ تنفس ۱۲ در دقیقه، و دمای بدن ۳۵.۹ درجه سانتی‌گراد (۹۶.۶ درجه فارنهایت) می‌باشد. وزن او ۵۵.۰ کیلوگرم (۱۲۱.۳ پوند) و قد او ۱۶۶ سانتی‌متر (۵ فوت ۵ اینچ) است. معاینه فیزیکی نشان دهنده توسعه خوب عضلات و کاهش چربی بدن است. اسکن استخوان کاهش رسوبات معدنی کلسیم را نشان می‌دهد. کدام بیان درباره وضعیت این بیمار صحیح است؟
answer: Decreased adiposity contributes to hypoestrogenemia in this patient
answer_persian: کاهش چربی بدن باعث کاهش سطح استروژن در این بیمار می‌شود.

options.A: Hypertrophied muscles are the source of additional androgens which interfere with the patient’s menstrual cycle
options.C: Decreased adiposity contributes to hypoestrogenemia in this patient
options.D: The patient is likely to have decreased blood estrogen concentration due to increased liver metabolism
options.E: The patient should be checked for hyperthyroidism because such extensive lipolysis is likely to result from thyroid hyperfunction

options_persian.A: ماهیچه‌های هیپرتروف شده منبع آندروژن‌های اضافی هستند که در چرخه قاعدگی بیمار اختلال ایجاد می‌کنند.
options_persian.B: این بیمار مقاومت به انسولین دارد
options_persian.C: کاهش چربی بدن به کاهش سطح استروژن در این بیمار منجر شده است.
options_persian.D: بیمار احتمالاً به دلیل افزایش متابولیسم کبدی، کاهش غلظت استروژن خون خواهد داشت.
options_persian.E: بیمار باید از نظر پرکاری تیروئید مورد بررسی قرار گیرد زیرا چنین لیپولیز گسترده‌ای احتمالاً ناشی از پرکاری تیروئید است.

She had her menarche at the age of 12 and menstruated normally until last year. She is not sexually active. On physical examination, the vital signs include blood pressure 100/60 mm Hg, heart rate 55/min, respiratory rate 12/min, and temperature 35.9°C (96.6°F). A bone scan shows decreased calcium mineral deposits. Which statement about this patient’s condition is correct?

question: A healthy 23-year-old male is undergoing an exercise stress test as part of his physiology class. If blood were to be sampled at different locations before and after the stress test, which area of the body would contain the lowest oxygen content at both time points?
question_persian: یک مرد سالم 23 ساله در حال انجام آزمایش استرس ورزشی به عنوان بخشی از کلاس فیزیولوژی خود است. اگر خون در نقاط مختلفی قبل و بعد از آزمایش استرس نمونه‌برداری شود، کدام ناحیه از بدن در هر دو زمان کمترین میزان اکسیژن را خواهد داشت؟
new_question_stem: A healthy 23-year-old male is undergoing an exercise stress test as part of his physiology class. If blood were to be sampled at different locations before and after the stress test, which area of the body would contain the lowest oxygen content at both time points?
